welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hempstead, where you'll find a charming blend of small-town hospitality and big city amenities. Enjoy our historic downtown, vibrant arts scene, and beautiful parks as you explore all that our city has to offer. We're excited to have you here!

restaurants.name: Louisiana Joe's Sandwich Shop
restaurants.description: Louisiana Joe's Sandwich Shop is a cajun and creole restaurant located in Oceanside.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Air Canada, American Airlines, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines, Frontier Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is used for regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
